biography.title: Biography
biography.itemT1: Hi, I'm Chee Zhang, a software engineer with a passion for creating responsive and visually appealing web applications. With 3 years of experience in the field, I am always looking for new and innovative ways to bring my clients' visions to life.
biography.itemT2: I hold the view that design extends beyond aesthetics, as its primary purpose is to address challenges and craft user-friendly, instinctive experiences.
biography.itemT3: Whether I'm working on a website, mobile app, or other digital product, I consistently uphold my dedication to achieving top-notch design quality and prioritizing user-centric approaches in all my endeavors. I look forward to the opportunity to bring my skills and passion to your next project.

experience.title: Working Experience
experience.work1: Developed and maintained frontend components using React, optimizing for performance and code reusability.
experience.work2: Took initiative to plan and execute website revamp projects, focusing on user interface improvements and enhanced user experiences.

education.title: Education
education.certificate: Bachelor Of Electrical And Electronic Engineering
education.info1: Relevant courses included Data Structures and Algorithms, Design & Innovation Project, and Web Design Application.
education.info2: Researched on opinion dynamics and effects of social network topology on various agents.
